Name: Seven Nations
About the game: The leaders of the seven nations failed to reach a peace agreement. All kingdoms are now at war. Seven Nations is a real-time battle game. Seven villages develop in real time and then send their units to wage war on the neighbouring villages. You can decide to control the construction of your village yourself or let an AI do it. You can also control the time and many other parameters! Which nation will win? Features : ■ More than 8 different types of buildings! ■ A large number of parameters that can be modified! ■ Day / Night Cycle! ■ Many different units! ■ Nice background music! ■ Real-time warfare! ( RTS)
